publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3594 Gil Paterson: Thanks to Scottish Gymnastics—That the Parliament congratulates all the coaches, volunteers and others from the world of Scottish gymnastics who participated in the Beginner and Intermediate Floor and Vault Competition for girls aged from eight to 16, held at the Bell’s Sports Centre in Perth, which attracted individuals and teams from Shetland to Dumfries and all points in between and thanks all those who give up their time to ensure that events such as this are a success but, more importantly, to provide the expertise and advice on a long-term basis to encourage our young sports enthusiasts, which assists in keeping Scotland’s young people fit in body and mind. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Kidd*, Jackson Carlaw*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3594 Thanks to Scottish Gymnastics (lodged on 3 March 2009) Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3594 Thanks to Scottish Gymnastics (lodged on 3 March 2009) Hugh Henry*

S3M-3594 Gil Paterson: Thanks to Scottish Gymnastics—That the Parliament congratulates all the coaches, volunteers and others from the world of Scottish gymnastics who participated in the Beginner and Intermediate Floor and Vault Competition for girls aged from eight to 16, held at the Bell’s Sports Centre in Perth, which attracted individuals and teams from Shetland to Dumfries and all points in between and thanks all those who give up their time to ensure that events such as this are a success but, more importantly, to provide the expertise and advice on a long-term basis to encourage our young sports enthusiasts, which assists in keeping Scotland’s young people fit in body and mind. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell, Bill Kidd, Jackson Carlaw, Kenneth Gibson, Sandra White, Mary Scanlon, Hugh O’Donnell, Alasdair Allan, Jamie McGrigor, Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris, Rob Gibson, Stuart McMillan, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Michael Matheson, Hugh Henry
S3M-3594 Thanks to Scottish Gymnastics (lodged on 3 March 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-3594 Thanks to Scottish Gymnastics (lodged on 3 March 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3594 Thanks to Scottish Gymnastics (lodged on 3 March 2009) Angela Constance*
